divs: Sighting DetailsFirstly,Me and my child were stargazing and we saw a bright round object as bright as the moon.(we were out in the patio).as soon as we saw it,It got dimmer and moved northeast.Then we lost sight of it. I couldn't sleep that night.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Port Coquitlam
This sighting has never been favorited.
